title: Cypress Test
description: Cypress is a tool to automate end-to-end web tests across all modern browsers. This actor runs Cypress tests from `Cypress -> e2e` folder in the cloud and stores the results in the Apify platform. The results can be (programmatically or manually) retrieved using Apify's REST API.

viewportWidth.title: Viewport width
viewportWidth.description: Viewport width in pixels. Default is `1280`.
viewportWidth.sectionDescription: Configure the browser that will be used to run the tests.

viewportHeight.title: Viewport height
viewportHeight.description: Viewport height in pixels. Default is `720`.

defaultCommandTimeout.title: Default Command Timeout
defaultCommandTimeout.description: Maximum time the for the command to be executed. Default is `30000`.
defaultCommandTimeout.sectionDescription: These settings are not required for most use cases. Use them to customize or debug your test run.

video.title: Record video
video.description: Record video of the test run which is then stored in KVS. Default is true.
